en.name: After sales
en.coverDescription: The ‘sale’ doesn’t stop when the customer has bought a product or service, and after sales care can affect future buying decisions, as well as the reputation of both you and the company you work for. By taking this short course you will gain a greater understanding of how good service is critical even after a sale, and how you can have a positive impact on your company and on your customers.

fr.name: L’importance du service après-vente
fr.coverDescription: La « vente » ne s’arrête pas lorsque le client a acheté un produit ou un service, et le service après-vente peut influer sur les décisions d’achat futures, ainsi que sur votre réputation et celle de l'entreprise pour laquelle vous travaillez. En suivant ce petit cours, vous comprendrez mieux à quel point un service de qualité est essentiel même après une vente et comment vous pouvez avoir un impact positif sur votre entreprise et sur vos clients.

de.name: Die Bedeutung des After-Sales-Service
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
The ‘sale’ doesn’t stop when the customer has bought a product or service, and after sales care can affect future buying decisions, as well as the reputation of both you and the company you work for. By taking this short course you will gain a greater understanding of how good service is critical even after a sale, and how you can have a positive impact on your company and on your customers.
